content.rendered:
Directed by Vineeth Sreenivasan

Written by Vineeth Sreenivasan

Cast Pranav Mohanlal (Arun Neelakandan). Kalyani Priyadarshan (Nithya Balagopal). Darshana Rajendran (Darshana). Vijayaraghavan (Neelakandan). Johny Antony (Balagopal). Aju Varghese (Jimmy). Arun Kurian (Akhil Sathyam). Aswath Lal (Antony Thadikkaran). Annu Antony (Maya Padmanabhan). Abishek Joseph George (Kedar Naresh). Ann Jameela Saleem (Megha (as Ann Salim)). Megha Thomas (Jasleen). Sooraj Sun (Bridegroom). Jojo Jose (Pratik Tiwari). Jishnu Sreekumar (Ron Valiyaveetil). Ajith Thomas Abraham (Lijo). Kurian Joseph John (Joji soloman).Sanjay Menon. Kalesh Ramanand (Selva). Kaushik M.V.(Kaali).Raja Rani Pandian.A.R. Raja Ganesh.Aravindan R..Ajeesh Jose.Shersha Sherief. Atul Ram Kumar (Jackson). Sangeeth Prathap (Baiju). Ramesh Menon (Farooq).Nikhil Nair.Serah Mathews.Thushara Pillai.Manjula Mohandas.Vijayakrishnan A.B..Chitra Kumar.Adithyan Chadrashekar.Anjali Nair. Meenakshi Raveendran (Girl on dating app (voice)). Maria Vincent (Diya).Aarsha Mohan. Prashant Nair (North Indian Brides Father). Adarsh Sukumaran (TTR). Shiva Hariharan (Anto Abraham).Shaun Romy. Nabin Mahato (Nabin). Mathukkutty (Priest). Anjali S. Nair (Tamizh Selvi).Asha Madathil Sreekanth

Languages Malayalam

Producers Visakh Subramaniam. Sitara Suresh. Noble Babu Thomas

Production Big Bang Entertainments. Merryland Studio
